issue.title: [C#] Array / RecordBatch Builder Fluent API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4337](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4337). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement a fluent API for building arrays and record batches from Arrow buffers, flat arrays, spans, enumerables, etc.

A future implementation could extend this API with support for ADO.NET DataTables.
